title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: Strengthening Information Evaluation Skills in the Digital Age: Fact-Checking-Based Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply credibility criteria (source, purpose, evidence) with 80% accuracy when evaluating digital information from diverse sources
Learners can verify the factual accuracy of information with 90% accuracy using fact-checking tools (Reverse Image Search, fact-checking websites)
Learners can recognize biases occurring during information consumption and apply three or more strategies to mitigate them in practical contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
